snippet: “Orientale,” presented by Gotham Chamber Orchestra, takes as its premise a meeting of Eastern and Western cultures, with results that were appropriately lively and occasionally slightly rough.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews music program Orientale, performed by the Gotham Chamber Opera, at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: “Orientale,” presented by Gotham Chamber Orchestra, takes as its premise a meeting of Eastern and Western cultures, with results that were appropriately lively and occasionally slightly rough.

headline.seo: ‘Orientale’ From Gotham Chamber Orchestra at Poisson Rouge
headline.main: A Union of East and West, Conceived With Courage
headline.print_headline: A Union of East and West, Conceived With Courage
